name: Inescapable Land
description:
This is an adventure game about a man who want to discover the Inescapable Land.

Game features:

  • 4 main maps
  • 9 enemy types
  • 1 boss
  • Spites, cannons...
  • Checkpoints, save, load,..
  • 10 upgrades: Sword, Mana, Hp, Speed,....
  • 6 music tracks

    • Game control:

    Arrow left or right to Move

    Arrow up to Jump

    Z to Attack

    Ctrl + Arrow left or right to Dash

    F11 to Switch between fullscreen and windowed mode

    P to Pause game

    Please feel free to give me any feedback.

    I'm looking for an artist. Contact me if you want to join my team.

    You can follow me on twitter at:

    @PVHDgames
